1.「ここが 砂の都ファラザード。| 他の国とは ずいぶん 雰囲気が違うだろう。: This is Sand City Farazard. It has a very|different atmosphere from the other nations.

2.「我が主の 統治のもとに| さまざまな欲望が 日夜問わず交差する……| まさに: Under the rule of my lord, all kinds of|desires intersect day and night...it is truly|the nightless city of the Demon World.

3.「ようやく 帰ってきたことだし | ゼクレスと バルディスタでの首尾を| 報告し: Now that I'm finally back, I have to report on|how things went in Zechres and Valdista...

4.「なじみの店にも カオを出しておきたい。| 先に このファラザードが誇る| 自由: I'd like to pop in on some old stores. Before|we go, let me show you the bazaar, the symbol|of freedom that Farazard prides itself on.

5.「活気があって 一見の価値があるぞ。: It's lively and worth a look.

6.「魔界にある ３つの大国のうち| ファラザードは いちばんの新興国だ。: Of the three major powers in the Demon World,|Farazard is the most fledgling.

7.「……もし お前が魔王だったら| そいつらをどうする？|<select_nc>|: ...if you were the Demon King, how would|you handle it?|<select_nc>|Knock 'em dead!|Ignore them.|Let me think.|<select_end>|<case 1>|<close>|<case 2>|<close>|<case 3>|<close>|<case_cancel>|<close>|<case_end>

8.「徹底的につぶす……か。 | たしかに 苦労してかき集めた財産を| 横取りする連: Crush them thoroughly...huh? Indeed, those who|take away our hard-earned wealth may need to|be punished.

9.「俺は 王城と連絡を取ってみる。 | お前は バザールの問題を 解決してみせろ。: I'll try to get in touch with the castle. You|try to solve the problem in the bazaar.

10.「わかった わかった……後でな！| こっちは 帰ってきたばかりなんだし| ちょっ: All right, all right... later! I just got|back, so give me a break.

11.「それと お前には この城内に| 部屋を与えてやろう。| 魔王のしもべに ふさわ: And for you, I will give you a room in this|castle. A room of the finest quality, fit for|a servant of the Demon King.

12.「慣れぬ魔界で ユシュカに振り回され | 長旅の疲れも 出てくる頃だろう……。|:
I'm sure you're tired from your long journey,|being dragged around by Yushka through the|unfamiliar Demon World, so please feel free to|
|use this room.

13.「君は ユシュカの血を 与えられたことで| 魔族に変じ 生き延びたわけだが| あ:
You were given Yushka's blood, which turned|you into a demon and allowed you to survive,|but it's a forbidden spell that is a secret|
|even in the Demon World.

14.「ユシュカのことだから いつもの調子で| 君のことを しもべにしてやったとでも|: Yushka, in his usual fashion, may have told|you that he made you his servant, but...

15.「ユシュカは ただの魔族ではない。魔王だ。| そんな重大事を 伝令から聞かされて: Yushka is not just a demon. He is a Demon|King. I was quite worried when the messenger|told me of such an important matter...

16.「あいつにも 何か 考えがあってのこと。 | その決断が 必ず 実を結ぶと信じ|: He had something in mind. I've been entrusted|with the castle until now, believing that his|decision will surely bear fruit.

17.「そして……今日 この城に到達した| ユシュカと君を見て それが正しかったと|: And... seeing you and Yushka reach this castle|today, I am finally convinced that I was|right.

18.「他国の魔王との 危険な交渉をとげて| 我が主を ファラザードまで| 無事に 帰: You have negotiated dangerous deals with Demon|Kings from other lands and returned my lord|safely to Farazard.

19.「まったく。ウワサをすれば これか……。| 迷惑をかけることを 少しも 悪びれな: Indeed. I'm not the least bit sorry for any|trouble I've caused.

20.「お互いに 苦労は多いが | 共に あいつを支えていこう。: We both have a lot of hard work ahead of us,|but together we can support him.

21.「ユシュカなら ザードの尖塔だろう。| 昔から 高いところに 登りたがるのだ。: Yushka is probably at the Zard Spire. He's|always liked climbing up high places.

22.「ナジーン！ どうして お前は| そんなに アタマが カタいんだ！？: Nazine! Why are you so hard-headed?

23.「いくら 幼なじみとはいえ | 魔王様に向かって なんだ そのクチのきき方！: Even though we've known each other since|childhood... How dare you talk to the Demon|King like that!

24.「暗くて いちいちカオなど わかるものか。| あーあ カタブツな副官のおかげで|: It was too dark to recognize every single|face. Ahh, my little snub-nosed lieutenant has|ruined my momentary respite.

25.「はっ。副官殿は 有事の際に | ファラザードを守る 自信がないとみえる。| そ: Ha. It seems that the deputy doesn't have the|confidence to protect Farazard in case of|emergency. With me and him...

26.「お……おお。なんだ。| いるならいるって 言えよ。: Oh...oh. What the hell. If you're here, at|least say something.

27.「お前 起きるのが 遅すぎだぞ。 | 待ちくたびれた上に いらん説教をくらった。: Took you long enough to get up. Not only was I|tired of waiting, I've had to put up with|never-ending lectures.

28.「ああ……この衣装は 魔王の正装だ。 | いよいよ 魔仙卿に会うというのに| 普: Ah...this is the Demon King's formal attire.|We're about to meet the Oracle, and we don't|want to go looking like a commoner, do we?

29.「よし！ これで 全員そろったな。| ナジーン。これからのことを| こいつに 説: All right! We're all here. Nazine. Explain to|them what's going to happen next.

30.「待たせたな ふたりとも。: I've kept you waiting, you two.

31.「大審門よ！ 役者はそろったぞ！| 魔仙卿への道を 開くがいい！: Demongate! The players have assembled! Open|the way to the Oracle!

33.「お前の踊るさまを 見物しててやる。| 後で 合流しようぜ。: I'll watch you dance. We'll meet up later.

34.「よう。ばっちり見てたぞ。| なかなかの 戦いぶりだったじゃないか。: Hey. I was watching you closely. You put up|quite a fight, didn't you?

35.「チッ……。あらかた 潰したつもりだったが | お前の存在を すっかり忘れてたぜ: I thought I'd destroyed most of them, but I'd|completely forgotten you existed.

36.「まったく……今のは さすがに疲れたぞ。| 早く 魔仙卿に会って| 文句のひとつ: I'm really tired of this. I can't wait to meet|Oracle and complain to him.

40.「いったい この山は どこまで続くんだ？| だいぶ 登ってきたと思うんだがな……: How far does this mountain go? We've already|come a long way...

41.「その 物騒なものをしまえよ ヴァレリア。| いったい 何の騒ぎだ？: Put that thing away, Valeria. What's going on|here?

42.「どう考えても あやしいよ……| 君も そう思うだろう？<yesno><clos: It's a bit suspicious... don't you think?|<yesno><close>

43.「おーい！ つべこべ言わず こっちこいよ。| ふたりの分も 食っちまうぞ。: Hey! Don't be shy, come on over. Or I'll eat|both your portions.

44.「……こうやって 三国の魔王が| 一堂に会するのは はじめてだな。: ...This is the first time the Demon Kings of|the three kingdoms have gathered in one place.

45.「小うるさい部下や 母親の監視もないんだ。| 気がねなく お互いのことを 話そう: No nagging subordinates or motherly|supervision. We can talk to each other without|restraint.

47.「ふん……貴様などで 相手になるのか？: Hmph... You think you're a match for me?

48.「ちっ……スッテンテンの 早とちりめ。| こいつは 大魔王候補者じゃないぜ。: Damn...Suttenten's hasty conclusion. He's not|a candidate for Great Demon King.

51.「ひとつ １００万ゴールドぉ！？| そんなの 買えるわけないっしょ！: One for a million gold!? I can't afford that!

52.「やくそうが ８０万ゴールド！？| なによ！ よそ者には 売れないってこと？: A Medical Herb for 800,000 gold!? What the|hell!? Are you saying you won't sell to|outsiders?

53.「イエ イエ イエ～！| ワタクシども ファラザード商業組合は| どんなお客様で: No, no, no! The Farazard Commercial|Association, welcomes all customers! Yes!

54.「ただ そのぉ…… | 今は深刻な 品不足でして ハイ……。| これでも 適正価: But, you see... there is a serious shortage|right now, and this is still the best price.|Yes.

55.「んもー 信じらんない！| ファラザードのバザールは やくそうも買えない| ぼっ: I can't believe this! I'll tell everyone that|the bazaar in Farazard is a rip-off where you|can't even buy simple herbs!

59.「まずは 無事で何よりだわ。 | おいしい おみやげ話のひとつでも| 聞かせてほ: First of all, I'm glad you're safe. I'd love|to hear one of your lovely stories, but...

60.「まあ かわいらしい しもべさん。| いくらで 買ったの？| 私に 売ってくださ: Well, what a cute little servant. How much did|you pay for them? Would you sell them to me?

61.「ざれ言は後にしろ ジルガモット。 | 元締めの お前がいながら| このありさま: Save the small talk for later, Jirgamot.|You're supposed to be in charge here, so what|the hell is going on?

62.「このバザールは ジャリムバハ砂漠の北東| ディンガ交易所から運ばれる| さまざ: This bazaar trades in a variety of goods|coming from the Northeast Dinga Trade Post in|the Jyarimbaha Desert.

63.「近ごろ その大事な交易路 ズムウル峠に | 次から次へと 凶悪な魔物が現れて|:
Recently, one after another, vicious monsters|have appeared on the Zumul Pass, an important|trade route, and attacking the traders who are|
|carrying goods.

64.「ファラザード軍に 討伐を頼んだものの| あちらにも ご事情があるようで| 大き:
I asked Farazard's army to take down the|enemy, but they said they had their own|reasons and that they could not make any major|
|moves...

65.「そーなんでゴザイマス！| 品物が届かなくて 売るものナッシン！: That's right! I have nothing to sell because I|haven't received any goods!

66.「そして 物価は 急上昇……| わたくし 首が回りません…………。: And prices have skyrocketed... my head is|spinning...

67.「……みんな あなたを 待っていたの。: We've all been waiting for you.

68.「後のことは まかせておけ。 | 俺たちが 元通りのバザールに戻してやる。: We'll take care of the rest. We'll restore the|bazaar to its original state.

69.「ユシュカ様ァ～！ 恩にきるデスヨ～！: Yushka-sama~! I am in your debt!

70.「ひとまず 旅の疲れは 取らないとな。| 宿に泊まって 作戦会議だ。: At first, I should get over the fatigue of the|trip. We'll stay at an inn for a strategy|meeting.

71.「この世には ワケありな奴らが ごまんといる。 | 集落からあぶれた者 借金を背:
There are a million and one people in this|world. Those who have been left behind, those|who have fallen into debt, those who have lost|
|their homes, those who have nowhere to go...

72.「あらゆる者を分けへだてなく 受け入れる代わり| それまでの 一切の縁を 断ち切:
In exchange for accepting all people without|distinction, he would cut off all previous|ties with the Demon King of Farazard and make|
|them enter into a master-servant contract.

73.「ゼクレスのような 血統主義でも | バルディスタみたいな 恐怖統治でもない方法: He gathered his people together in a way that|was neither pedigreed like Zechres nor a reign|of terror like Valdista's, but a nation.

74.「ファラザードの魔王の務めは| 契約を 果たすこと。| 民を庇護し その暮らしを: The duty of the Demon King of Farazard is to|fulfill his covenant. He protects his people|and guarantees their livelihood...

75.「だが 魔王との契約を結ばず | 一方的に ファラザードの富を奪おうとする| な:
However, there are also some rogue thieves in|the neighborhood who do not make a pact with|the Demon King and unilaterally try to steal|
|Farazard's wealth.

76.「今回の バザールの問題も| ファラザードの魔王のやり方が| 気に食わない連中の: The bazaar problem must be the work of those|who don't like the way the Demon King of|Farazard is doing things.

77.「ならず者など 取るに足らない……か。| いい視点だ。俺も 問題の根っこは| 別: The "rogue" is insignificant...huh? That's a|good point of view. I, too, have a feeling|that the root of the problem lies elsewhere.

78.「ああ よく考えろ。 | 思考を止めず 最善の策を求める者だけが| 魔界を 生き: Oh, think about it. Only those who never stop|thinking and seek the best plan can survive in|Demon World.

79.「……よし いいだろう。 | お前の思う通り 好きにするがいい。: Okay, fine. You can do whatever you want.

80.「この件に関しては さっき会った | 元締めのジルガモットが くわしいだろう。: Jirgamot, the man I just met with, would know|a lot more about this.

81.「俺のしもべとして ふさわしい働きを| 期待してるぞ。今は 身体を休めておけ。|: I expect you to do what my servant deserves.|For now, rest your body. Tomorrow, we'll go|our separate ways.

84.「これでこそ ファラザードのバザールだわ。 | しもべさんのおかげで ひと安心よ: Now that's what I call a bazaar in Farazard.|Thanks to you, I'm relieved.

85.「ネエ ネエ ネエ～！| アンタ 大活躍だったんだってェ！？| ヤルジャン しも: Hey, hey, hey! I heard you were a big hit!|Yarujan, servo!

86.「なるほど。有能なるかな しもべ殿………… | ユシュカ様の目に 狂いなし。: I see. I wonder if you are capable, servant-|sama... Yushka-sama's eyes are not mad.

87.「ふふ……しもべ呼ばわりは お気に召さない？ | これまでも ユシュカに さんざ: You don't like it when I call you a servant?|Yushka has been taking you around a lot in the|past, so it's only natural.

88.「でもね ユシュカは 本当に| 価値のあるものにしか 興味を示さないの。| まし: But you see, Yushka is only interested in|things that are truly valuable. Especially if|it's something she wants by her side.

89.「あなた よっぽど| ユシュカに 気に入られているのよ。: You must be very much in Yushka's good graces.

90.「おぉ～い 次の隊商が 到着するぞぉ。 | 今まで 遅れてた分が 一気に来るそう: The next troop ship is arriving. The ones that|have been delayed until now are coming in one|fell swoop.

91.「ヤッベ！ はたらかにゃソンソン！| また会おうゼ しもべ！: Yabbe! I've got to work, I've got to work! See|you again, servant!

92.「御用の際は ごひいきに しもべ殿…………。: Please visit us when you need us...

93.「ふふ。しもべ殿……ね。とはいえ | 大活躍したのに あんまりな扱いよね？| 今:
Hmmm. Shimobe-dono...right. But you didn't|treat him well even though he did a great job,|did you? I'll tell him to call you by your|
|name from now on.

94.「いい取り引きを ありがとう。| 今度は お客様としても 会いにきて。| あなた: Thank you for a good deal. Come and see me as|a customer. You're always welcome.

95.<center>いまいましき ユシュカのしもべへ|よくも コケにしてくれたな。|: How dare you mock the servants of Yushka! You|have shattered our pride.

96.<center>裏通りのアジトで お前を待つ。|逃げられると 思うなよ！: I'll be waiting for you in a backstreet|hideout. Don't think you can escape!

99.「アンタのこたァ ずっと監視してたんだヨゥ。| ユシュカと バザールに現れた時か: I've been watching you. Ever since you and|Yushka showed up at the bazaar.

100.「流れ者どもを そそのかして 隊商を追いはぎィ| ファラザードの息の根止める 親: You're going to seduce the hoboes, chase the|traders, stifle Farazar, and your master's|plan... yoo-hoo, you got me.

101.「おやびん おやびーん！| 例のヤツが ノコノコきたよーお！: Oh, baby. Oh, baby! You know what just came|along!

102.「ガーッハッハッハッハ！！| 泣く子も黙る シシカバブ団の首領ぉ……: Gah-ha-ha-ha! The leader of the Shish Kebab|clan...

103.「この シシカバブさまに たでついたこどぉ| たあっぷり 後悔させでやるろぉおん: You'll rue the day you ever laid a finger on|this Shish Kebab!

104.「もともどぉ ここは ザード遺跡ってぇ | オデたち 盗賊団のすみかだぁ。| そ: Originally, this place was called Zard Ruins,|the home of I and my band of thieves. That's|where the current Demon King took over.

105.「あんの魔王は バカ野郎だぁ！| オデたちのこと なんにも わがっちゃいねえ。: Your Demon King is an idiot! He doesn't know|anything about I and the others.

106.「自由の国だ なんだと ほざきやがるがぁ | けっぎょくは アタマの切れるヤツが: They talk about a free country, but all that|matters is that smart people do business, make|money and get rich...

107.「だっだら オデたちも 自由にするど。| こんな ふざけた国はぁ| 全部 奪っで: Then we'll let the I's go free. We're gonna|take this whole joke of a country, we're gonna|tear it apart...

108.「この オデが 王サマに | なってやるんらよぉおおおおぉおお！！: I'm going to be the king!

109.「なるほど そういうことか。: I see. So that's how it is.

110.「こいつを 泳がせておいて よかったぜ。| 大した元手もかからず| アジトもホシ: I'm glad I let this guy swim. It didn't take|much money to catch all the ajit and hoshi at|once.

111.「ばかばかーッ！| ユシュカには 気づかれないように| おびき寄せろって 言った: This is ridiculous! I told you to lure Yushka|in undetected!

113.「暴力に訴えるのは 好きじゃないんだがな……。: I'm not a fan of resorting to violence...

115.「コイツラ マジ ヤッベー！| イカレタ ツヨサ ハンパネー！: These guys are really bad! They're so cool!

117.「あらかたの賊は つぶしたつもりだったが| お前らみたいな ヤンチャ坊主どもが|: I thought I had taken down most of the|bandits, but there are still a few of you|naughty boys left.

118.「俺のいない間に やりたい放題 | やっちまおうって 目論みだろうが……| 甘か: You planned to do whatever you wanted while I|was gone...but you were naive.

119.「たしかに ここは 自由の都。| だが 自由にしていいことと 悪いことがある。|:
It is true that this is a free city. But there|are things you can do with your freedom and|things you can't. The bad thing is to resort|
|to violence.

120.「この 世の中の常識…… | 他の連中にも 教えてやってくれるな？: Will you teach the rest of the world about|this common sense?

122.「やれやれ。手間かけさせやがって……: Oh, man. You made me work so hard...

127.「お前の その体力と 頑丈さがあれば | ファラザードの特攻隊長くらいには なれ: With your strength and sturdiness, you could|be Farazard's suicide captain!

128.「ばっ ばっ ばっ……！| バカにしでんのがあああああああっっ！！: Blah, blah, blah...! You're making fun of me!

129.「こちらです ナジーン殿！| ジルガモットからの 通報では| ここに 盗賊団のア: This way, Mr. Naziane! Jirgamot reported that|this is where the thieves are hiding.

131.「覚えてろ ユシュカぁ！| いつか オデが ボコボコにしてやるんど！！: Remember, Yushka! One day, I'm gonna beat the|Bangers out of you!

132.「賊どもは まだ 近くにいる。| 速やかに追討せよ。: The bandits are still nearby. Pursue them|quickly.

134.「……お前たちは 盗賊団の者ではないな？: You're not from the band of thieves, are you?

135.「こんな 品格にあふれた 盗賊がいるか？: What kind of thief would have such dignity?

136.「本件に関わった者たちは| この後 ファラザード城へ出頭し| 一部始終を 説明す: All those involved in this matter are to|report to Farazard Castle after this meeting|and explain the whole story.

137.「俺たちは ならず者を 成敗したんだぞ。| 少しは ほめてくれたって いいんだぜ: We defeated the ruffians. We deserve a little|praise.

138.「ファラザード城の正門は 中央広場にある。| 門兵のホルティンに 声をかければ|: The main entrance to Farazard Castle is in|Center Plaza. Just ask for Holten, the gate|guard, and he will let you in.

139.「あの メタルスライムより おカタいのが| ファラザードの魔王の副官 ナジーン殿: More formal than that Metal Slime is Najeen,|second-in-command of the Demon King of|Farazard.

140.「さて。ご招待あずかったことだし| いよいよ ファラザード城へ……| 魔王様との: Well, now. Now that we've been invited, it's|time to go to Farazard Castle... and meet the|Demon King.

141.「ゼクレスの魔王と バルディスタの魔王を| 大審門の前に 引きずり出さんがため|:
The Demon King of Zechres and the Demon King|of Valdista are to meet in order to bring them|before the Great Demongate, and Farazard's|
|emissary...

142.「その正体は 魔界の南を統べる 新興国の魔王。| ……まあ そういうことだ。: His true identity is the Demon King of a new|country that rules the southern part of Demon|World.

143.「ユシュカは 自分の言葉で| ふたりの魔王を説得すると 我を押し通した。| 私は: Yushka pushed herself to persuade the two|Demon Kings with her own words. I objected,|saying it was too dangerous...

144.「だから 素性は 隠し通しただろ。| その辺の雑魚どもにバレたら 面倒なのは|: That's why I kept my identity secret. Of|course I knew that it would be troublesome if|the mooks around here found out.

145.「しかし この期に及んで ご自分のしもべにまで| 隠し通していたのには 感心しま: But I'm not impressed that he kept it a secret|from his own servants, even at this late stage|of his life.

146.「ファラザードに戻って 身の安全が確保できたら| すぐにでも 伝えるつもりだった: I was going to tell you as soon as I got back|to Farazard and felt safe.

147.「だが バザールでは 問題が起きていて| それどころじゃなくなったんだ。| これ: But there's been a problem in the bazaar, and|I've had enough of it. This is your negligence|to take care of my absence, okay?

148.「お手をわずらわせ 申し訳ありません。| ですが こちらにも 事情がありまして…:
I apologize for the trouble I have caused you.|But we have our own reasons for being here,|and we have been eagerly awaiting the return|
|of our king.

149.「ご存知の通り 新興国である我が国の兵力は | 充実しているとは言いがたく 国境: As you know, as an emerging nation, we are not|well armed, and we are struggling to both|defend our borders and guard our castles.

150.「あなたが外遊中に得た 豊富な経験をいかして | この状況を打破する 目覚ましい:
I hope that you will use the wealth of|experience you gained during your trip to|Japan to share with us your remarkable|
|policies that will help us to overcome this|situation.

151.「彼女の 労をねぎらうのを| どうぞ お忘れなく。: Please don't forget to thank her for her hard|work.

153.「ほら。これは これまでの礼と……| シシカバブ団を退治した 手間賃だ。| 遠慮:
Here. This is for all the work you've done so|far and for the trouble you've taken in|exterminating the Shish Kebabs. Feel free to|
|take it.

154.「ナジーン。後は まかせるぞ。: Nadine. I'll leave the rest to you.

156.「君の部屋は １階の西側に 用意させよう。| 部屋の前には 侍女のウテンが 立っ:
I will have your room prepared on the west|side of the 1F. Uten, the maid's room, will be|standing in front of the room. If you get|
|lost, you can use her as a landmark.

157.「……君とは 少し 話がしたい。| 私も 後で向かうから| 部屋で 待っていても: I'd like to have a word with you. I'll be on|my way later, so could you wait for me in my|room?

158.「ユシュカが アストルティアから連れてきた| 君の件については 報告を受けていた: Yushka had reported to me about your case that|you brought from Astoltia.

159.「ユシュカと 血の契約を 交わしたこともな。| ……話したかったのは そのことだ: And that you made a blood pact with Yushka.|That's what I wanted to talk to you about.

160.「高位の魔族が 他者に 生き血を与えることで| その生命と 運命を 分かちあう儀: It is a ritual in which a high-ranking demon|shares his life and destiny by giving his|lifeblood to another.

161.「禁術とは そんな 都合のよいものではない。: The forbidden art is not such a convenient|thing.

162.「命さえ落としかねない 危険な賭けなのだ。| まして 魔族ならぬ者に 血を与える:
It is a dangerous gamble that could even kill|you. And to give blood to someone who is not a|demon... to tell the truth, it's almost a|
|miracle that we succeeded.

163.「あらためて 礼を言わせてほしい。| 君には 本当に感謝している。: I want to thank you again. I am truly grateful|to you.

164.「あいつは 型破りで 危うい所もある……。| 正直 会談の成功よりも その身の無:
He's unconventional and dangerous at times,|but... to be honest, his safety is more|valuable to me than the success of our|
|meeting. than the success of the talks.

165.「死んだ魔王より 生きている使い魔 | ……とは言うが アストルティアにも| 似: They say "A living Famililar is better than a|dead Demon King," but isn't there a similar|saying in Astoltia?

167.「帰ってこられたはずの 魔王様が| また どこかへ 姿を消されまして……。: The Demon King, who was supposed to have|returned, has disappeared again.

168.「これから 私は 今後の公務について| 臨時の会議を 開かねばならない……。|: I have to hold a special meeting about my|future official duties... I would appreciate|it if someone could pick me up.

169.「魔界の南部は 砂漠に覆われていて| 豊かな実りなど とても 期待できない。|:
The southern part of Demon World is covered|with desert, and it is not expected to produce|abundant harvests. That is why trade has|
|developed since ancient times.

170.「砂漠の小国家群が それぞれに隊商を組んで| 農作物や家畜 毛皮や織物など| さ: Small groups of desert nations trade with each|other in various goods, such as crops,|livestock, furs, and textiles.

171.「俺も もとは 宝石商の生まれだ。| 隊商の荷車が ゆりかごみたいなものだった。: I, too, was born into the jewelry business.|The wagons of the merchants were like cradles.

172.「宝石は 富と権力の象徴だから | 俺が渡り歩いた国は どこも活気にあふれ| 夢: Jewelry is a symbol of wealth and power, so|every country I've been to has been a vibrant,|dreamy, glorious place.

173.「だが そういう国ほど おどろくくらい| あっさりと 滅んでしまう。| そんな光: However, I was surprised at how easily such a|country was destroyed. I have seen such a|scene many times...

174.「侵略 内乱 あるいは 天災…… | なんにせよ そのきざしが現れた時| 奴らは: Invasion, civil war, natural disasters...|whatever it is, at the first sign of it, they|put it off...

175.「そして いつしか 積もり積もった | 災いの火種が 破滅を呼び寄せるのだ。: And one day, the accumulated sparks of|misfortune will bring ruin.

176.「思考を止めることは 死ぬことと同じだ。| 考え続け 新しいものを取り入れなけれ: To stop thinking is the same as dying. If you|don't keep thinking and taking in new things,|you won't survive in this Demon World.

177.「……だから 俺は| 今までの 魔界にはない方法で| 俺の理想郷を 築くことにし: So I've decided to build my utopia in a way|that has never been done before in the Demon|World.

178.「そう……今まで どんな魔王も| 試したことのない 新たな方法で…………。: Yes... in a new way that no Demon King has|ever tried before...

179.「これが 砂の都ファラザード。| 俺の 自慢の国だ。: This is Sand City Farazard. It's my pride and|joy.

180.「ここまで 国を大きくするのは 苦労したぞ。| ジャリムバハ砂漠の小国家群を あ: It was hard work to make the country this big.|We had to unify the small states of the|Jyarimbaha Desert by any means necessary.

181.「まだ 解決すべき問題は ごまんとある。| シシカバブ団みたいな連中は ファラザ: There are still a million problems to solve.|People like the Shish Kebabs are the dark side|of Farazard...

182.「だが 俺の野望は ファラザードに留まらない。 | この魔界は もっと新しく も: But my ambitions go beyond Farazard. I can|make this Demon World newer, more exciting,|more interesting.

183.「それを 成しとげられるのは……| 大魔王になった 俺だけだ。: Only I, the Great Demon King, can accomplish|this.

184.「お前のほうは 早く 元の身体に戻りたい | 一心だろうが 俺が 大魔王になるま:
I know you just want to get back to your|normal body as soon as possible, but until I|become the Great Demon King, you're going to|
|have to work hard, so be prepared.

185.「明朝 デモンマウンテンへ 出発だ。| 俺の 足手まといにならぬよう| 自分の部: Tomorrow morning, we will leave for Demon|Mountain. Make sure you rest well in your room|so that you don't slow me down.

186.「至極 まっとうな進言をしてますよ 私は。| 私のアタマが カタいのではなく|: I am giving you a very honest advice. It is|not that my head is too hard, but that your|head is too loose.

187.「昨夜遅く 裏通りで 賊の掃討にあたっていた| 兵士たちを呼び集め 勝手に 任務:
Late last night, I summoned the soldiers who|had been sweeping up bandits in the alleyways,|relieved them of their duties, and threw a|
|banquet, where they drank, sang and had a good|time.

188.「駆けつけてみれば 兵士だけでなく | 町の住民……挙句の果てに おたずね者まで:
When I rushed over, I found not only the|soldiers but also the townspeople...and to top|it off, even the ushers were included in the|
|party circle, it seems?

189.「あなたという人は……！ | もう少し 魔王としての自覚を持って| 行動するよう: You are...! I told you to act with a little|more awareness as the Demon King.

190.「それから ゼクレスと バルディスタでの行動も | 決して ほめられたものでは: And your behavior in Zechres and Valdista has|not been complimentary at all. Your attitude|is one thing...

191.「あなたこそ すっかり 寝坊したくせに。| 魔王が しもべに 責任転嫁ですか……: You're the one who overslept. Demon King is|shifting the responsibility to Servome...

192.「昨日は ザードの尖塔まで| ユシュカを 呼びにいってくれたそうだな。| 手間を: I heard you went to the Zard Spire yesterday|to call Yushka. Sorry to have caused you so|much trouble.

193.「これから 君たちは ゲルヘナ幻野を北上し| 大審門を目指すことになる。| 君も: From now on, you will travel northward through|the Gerhena Field to the Demongate. You must|have visited there at least once.

194.「ユシュカからの要請に応え 他国の魔王たちも | 大審門前の集落に 集まってくる:
In response to Yushka's request, Demon Kings|from other countries will gather at the|settlement in front of the Great Gate of|
|Inquisition. Beyond the gate is finally Demon|Mountain.

195.「デモンマウンテンでは 大魔王の資格を問う | さまざまな試練が 待っているそう:
At Demon Mountain, there are various trials|waiting to test the qualifications of a Great|Demon King. The contents of the trials change|
|each time the Demongate is opened.

196.「もちろん 大魔王になろうとする魔族は | 三国の魔王だけに 限らないし| 候補:
Of course, the demons seeking to become Great|Demon King are not limited to the Demon Kings|of the three kingdoms, and the competition|
|among them will be fierce.

197.「ふん……。 | せいぜい 見極めてもらおうじゃないか。| 大魔王たらんとする俺: Well... let's see how big you are. Let's see|how big my capacity to be the Great Demon King|is.

198.「ナジーン 留守はまかせた。| 先に行ってるぞ！: Nazine, I'll take care of the house. I'll go|ahead!

200.「まーた 城の上から 飛び降りたんですかぁ？: Did you jump off the top of the castle again?

201.「あんな 行儀の悪い 大魔王がいるものか。| まったく いつまで経っても 自由な: There is no such ill-mannered Great Demon|King. He'll always be a free man...

202.「……ともあれ ユシュカが| 無茶なマネをしないよう| しっかり 見張ってもらえ: Anyway, can you keep an eye on Yushka to make|sure she doesn't do anything crazy?

203.「君が ついていてくれれば| 安心して 留守をあずかれるというものだ。| 主のこ: With you at my side, I can leave the house in|peace. Take care of Lord.

204.「本当に 待たされたよ……。| 集まった連中が うるさくて仕方なかった。: We were really kept waiting... and the crowd|was so loud.

205.「やはり 貴様が ファラザードの魔王だったか。| あまりに遅いので もはや| 来: As I thought, you are the Demon King of|Farazard. I thought you would no longer be|coming since you are so late...

207.「……それじゃ さっそく 始めるとしよう。: Well then, let's get started right away.

208.<center>相克する 天運を持つ者 集いし時|大魔王への道は 開かれる。|今: When those with opposing fortunes gather|together, the path to the Great Demon King|will open. Now is the time...

209.<center>王の試練を 乗り越え|いざ 頂へと 来たれ！！: You have passed the trials of kings, and now|come to the top!

213.「この大矛を受け止める 覚悟のある者だけ | 登ってくるがいい！: Only those who are prepared to accept this|great contraption may climb up!

214.「さて……俺たちも 行くとしよう。| こんなところで 雑魚に構ってるヒマはない。: Well... we'd better get going. We don't have|time to waste on small fry here.

215.「あんれまあ……門が 開いてますじゃ。| まいど おおきに！: Well, well, well... the gate is open. Thank|you very much!

218.「まだ 道のりは長そうだ。| さっさと 先に進むとしよう。: We still have a long way to go. Let's move on|quickly.

219.「おいおい……さびしいことを 言いなさんな。| お互い 知らぬ仲じゃ ないんだか: Hey, hey, hey... don't be sad. We're not|strangers to each other.

220.「今日は あの時の礼に| ちょっとした プレゼントを用意したのさ。| きっと 気: I have a little present for you today, as a|thank you for what you did for me. I think|you'll like it.

223.「大魔王の資格を問う試練に 手助けなど不要。 | なぜ 命令を無視して ついてき: I don't need help in this test of my|qualifications to be the Great Demon King. Why|did you disobey my orders and follow?

224.「いや なんでって…………| そりゃァ 心配だし………………なァ？: No, because... well, I'm worried about you,|you know?

225.「私のチカラが 信じられない者は| そこに並べ……。: If you don't believe in my power, line up|there...

226.「あの岩と同じように たたき斬ってやる！: I'm going to cut it down just like that rock!

228.「よう。助かったぜ ヴァレリア。 | よかったら 一緒に 上を目指さないか？: Hey, Valeria. Thanks for the help, Valeria. I|was wondering if you'd like to join me in|aiming for the top?

230.「同行すれば お前の かわいい部下たちに | カラまれることはないだろうと 思っ: I figured if I went with you, I wouldn't have|to be harassed by your pretty boys.

231.「これで 一緒に行く理由は なくなったな。: Now there's no reason for us to go together.

233.「いやはや まったく……。| しかし これで 先へ進めますじゃ。: Well, well, well... but now we can move on.

235.「あんなのも 大魔王になろうとしてるのか……。: Is that guy trying to become the Great Demon|King too?

236.「まあいい。俺たちも 行くぞ。: That's all right. We're going, too.

237.「なんだって こんなところに？| おい 起きろ…………: What the hell are you doing here? Hey, wake|up...

242.「お前に 復讐するために はるばる| デモンマウンテンまで 追いかけてきたらしい: It seems he chased you all the way to Demon|Mountain to get revenge on you.

243.「その復讐心を 母上に……| エルガドーラに 利用されて| やっかいな呪いを か: And now my mother has taken advantage of my|vengeance and put a nasty curse on me by|Elgadora.

244.「奴の怒りが消えない限り| 呪いが 心と身体をむしばみ続け| 地獄の果てまでも: As long as his wrath remains, the curse will|continue to consume his mind and body, and|will follow him to the ends of hell...

246.「他人事みたいに言うな！ | お前のせいで 面倒に巻き込まれたんだぞ| ユシュカ: Don't talk to me like I'm somebody else!|You're the one who got us into trouble,|Yushka!

250.「おい シシカバブ！ どこを見てる。| お前の相手は そんな やせっぽちか？: Hey, Shish Kebab! Where are you looking?|You're not so skinny, are you?

251.「魔王ユシュカは この俺だ。| かかってこい！！: Demon King Yushka is me. Come and get me!

253.「これで 少しは アタマが冷えただろう。: I hope this has cooled your head a little.

254.「ぐっ……ユシュカぁ……！| オデは……まだまだ…………。: Ggh... Yushka...! I'm not ready... yet...

255.「シシカバブ。 | 盗賊団の首領なんて やめてしまえ。| もっと ふさわしい居場: Shish Kebab. Stop being the leader of a band|of thieves. I'll give you a place where you|belong.

257.「オデをッ！ バカにしやがってエエエエエ！！: I! You made a fool of me!

258.「なにを言っでも！ どう がんばっでも！| どうせバカだど 役立たずのクズだど|:
No matter what you say! No matter how hard I|try! I've been laughed at as an idiot, a|useless piece of shit, and looked down upon|
|as...

259.「だあれにも わがるはずがねえ！| のけものにされ みじめなゴミ捨て場が| 帰る:
Nothing could ever be more different! The|feelings of the I's, who have been cast out|and turned into a miserable dump to which they|
|can return...

260.「お前みたいな 魔王なんかにッ！| なんでも手に入れできた 魔王なんがにッ| わ: A Demon King like you! A Demon King who|received everything he wanted... who could|understand!

261.「は…はなせぇ ユシュカッ！| お前なんがにぃ 情けをかげられだぐねえ！: Hush... hush, Yushka! You're the one who|showed me no mercy!

263.「シシカバブよ。お前が 持っている| 底なしの体力と 打たれ強さほど| ファラザ: Shish Kebab. Nothing will serve Farazard|better than your bottomless strength and|resilience!

265.「今日から お前を……| ファラザード軍の特攻隊長に 任命する。| 盗賊団の仲間:
From this day forward, I am appointing you to|be the commander of Farazard's suicide|squadron. Your companions among the thieves|
|will also be mine.

266.「その代わり 俺が お前に| 生きる意味と 居場所を与えてやる。: In exchange, I will give you a meaning to life|and a place to stay.

271.「うぉおおん うぉおおん……ユシュカァ！| オデは お前を カン違いしてたど！: Yushkaa! I was wrong about you!

272.「こんな アタマが悪いオデでも| 役に立つなんで 言ってぐれたのは| ユシュカが: Yushka is the first person who has ever told|me that I am useful, even though I'm such an|idiot!

273.「あ……ああ……。| 俺が 大魔王になって帰るまで| ファラザードを守ってくれ。: Ah...ah...protect Farazard until I return as|the Great Demon King.

274.「ガーーーーッハッハッハッハッハ！！！| ガッテン承知ど！| 特攻隊長シシカバブ: Gahhhhhhhh!!!! Gatten I know! I'll leave it to|our suicide squad leader, Shish Kebab-sama!

275.「お前は 変わらないな……アスバル。| 自分の立場は後回しにして 誰かを助けちま:
You never change, Asbal. You put your own|position on the back burner and save someone|else. It's not like a Demon King at all, but|
|it's not bad.

277.「母が シシカバブに呪いをかけたのは| 明らかに お前たち ファラザード勢を|: Obviously, my mother's curse on Shish Kebab|was to thwart you Farazard's forces.

278.「僕は 母の助けなんて借りなくても| お前を倒して 大魔王になれるのに……| 余: I could have defeated you and become the Great|Demon King without my mother's help...but you|got in my way unnecessarily.

279.「……一緒に 行かないのか？: You're... you're not coming with me?

280.「行くわけないだろ。| 僕たちは 大魔王の座を争う| 敵同士なんだから……。: There's no way I'm going. We're enemies vying|for the throne of the Great Demon King...

281.「ふい～っ。| 戦いに巻き込まれず すみましたですじゃ。| まさに 漁夫の利です: Whew~. I was able to avoid getting caught up|in the battle. It's truly a fisherman's gain~.

283.「あいつ ずっと| ガケ下に 隠れてたのか……？: Has he been hiding under the gakke all this|time...?

284.「まあいい。俺たちも 行くぞ。: That's all right. We're going, too.

285.「ヒィィ～！| 命ばかりは お助けですじゃーーー！！: Heee~! I'm only trying to save your life...!

286.「おおっ……これぞ 魔仙卿様のおみちびき！| ワイは 旅の商人スッテンテン。|: Oh...this is Oracle's way! I am Peddler|Suttenten. I've seen you several times along|the way.

287.「大魔王になるために デモンマウンテンを| エッコラヤッコラ 登ってきたものの|: I've been climbing up Demon Mountain to become|Great Demon King, but I'm starting to get|tired...

288.「そこで ここまで生き残った みなさんで| 野営をしてはどうかと 考えたのですじ: So we thought, why don't we set up camp with|those of you who have survived this far?

289.「ですが～！ この お美しいかたが | ワイを おそろしいエモノで テンツクツン: But... This beautiful creature is going to use|a horrible object on me!

290.「当たり前だ。このような誘い| 競争相手をおとしいれる 罠に決まっている。: Of course. Such enticements are a trap to lure|competitors.

291.「めめめめ めっそうもない！| ワイは 何度も みなさんに救われて| 運よく こ: No, no, no, no, no, no! I've been fortunate to|have been saved by all of you many times, and|I've been able to climb this far.

292.「こんな 非力なワイにできる 恩返しといえば| ウットリするような やすらぎのひ: The only way I can return the favor is to|provide a relaxing and soothing experience...

293.「……よし。では 世話になろう。: Okay... I'll take care of you then.

294.「正気で 言ってるのか！？: Are you out of your mind?

295.「実際 ここまで来て ヘトヘトだろ。| この先で 待ち受ける試練を 考えれば|: In fact, you must be exhausted after having|come this far. Considering the trials that lie|ahead, it's best to keep your strength up.

296.「貴様ら……| 共謀しているのでは あるまいな？: You... are not in cahoots with them, are you?

297.「気になるなら 見張っていたら どうだ？ | たき火のそばで 休むだけだぞ。: If you care, why don't you keep watch? We'll|just rest by the Bonfire.

298.「その手には 乗らないよ……。| いつも そうやって 甘い言葉をささやいて| 自: I won't play into your hands... you always try|to get your way with Whisper Sweet Nothings|like that.

299.「同感だ。| ファラザードのやり方は 気に食わん。: I agree. I don't like Farazard's approach.

300.「そう 邪険にするな。| これが 交易で生きてきた 俺のやり方なのさ。: Well, don't be evil. This is the way of my|life as a trader.

301.「いつか ゼクレスや バルディスタとは | 大々的に交易をしたいと 考えている。: I hope to one day trade with Zechres and|Valdista on a larger scale. It would be|mutually beneficial in the long run.

302.「……だが 目先の利益だけで 物事は動かない。| 昔 ゼクレスでは それを思い知: ...but things don't work just for short-term|gains. I was reminded of that a long time ago|at Zechres. That was a big mistake...

303.「アスバルとは うまくやれると 思ってた。| 互いの益になる 取り引きをしたはず:
I thought I could get along with Asbal. I|thought we had a mutually beneficial deal, but|one little misunderstanding and it's all gone|
|to shit.

304.「ただ……自分でも なんとなく感じてたんだ。| 俺の中で 何かが欠けてる。| 利: But... even I felt something was missing.|There's something missing in me. Something|more important than profit.

305.「その時 師匠に 大切なことを教わった。| 俺が 幼い頃から 世話になってる|:
That's when my mentor taught me the most|important thing. He told me about a certain|traveler from Astoltia who had been a great|
|help to me since I was a little girl.

306.「師匠は 異郷の地アストルティアが| 発展してきた歴史を 語ってくれた。: My mentor recounted the history of Astoltia's|development as a foreign land.

307.「そこでは 種族の異なる者たちが集まり| それぞれの知識や文化が 混ざり合って|: There, people of different species came|together and mixed their knowledge and|cultures to create one big world.

308.「考え方が違えば ぶつかることもある。| そんな時は お互いに知恵を出しあって|: When we have different ways of thinking, we|sometimes clash. At such times, we must share|our wisdom and find a better solution...

309.「協調……。| 師匠の言う それは 協調というものらしい。: Cooperation... that's what the master calls|it, apparently.

310.「魔界にはない概念だが……| 俺には すぐ わかった。: It's a concept that doesn't exist in the Demon|World, but I knew it right away.

311.「この魔界に 足りなかったのは | 他者を受け入れて 交ぜ合わせ| 新しい価値を: What was missing in this Demon World was the|ability to accept others, to mix and mingle,|to create new values.

312.「たとえ 立場や利害が 違う相手でも| 協調することで 強く大きくなれる。そこに:
Even if we are in different positions or have|different interests, we can become stronger|and bigger by cooperating. There is no need|
|for pedigree, authority, fear, or violence.

313.「どうだ……| こんな考え方が お前たちにできるか？| 新しいものを取り入れ 滅: I wonder... can you even think like this? Can|you take something new and avert your own|extinction?

314.「よくも 御託をべらべらと……。| 協調だと？ 笑わせるな。: How dare you spout off so much nonsense|about... cooperation? Don't make me laugh.

315.「アストルティアには まだまだ| 未知の可能性が 眠ってるに違いない。: Astoltia must still have a lot of unknown|potential sleeping in the depths.

316.「そこで 向こうの世界に 行く方法を| あれこれと 思案していたら……| なんと: So I was trying to figure out how to get to|the other side, and Valdista opened the gate|for me.

317.「礼が遅れた。感謝してるぞ ヴァレリア。: I'm late thanking you. I appreciate it,|Valeria.

318.「……かの地に 侵攻した際| 何者かの手で妨害され| 我が軍は 撤退を余儀なくさ: When we invaded that land, we were intercepted|by someone and our forces were forced to|retreat.

320.「やめておいたほうがいい。| ユシュカは 昔から そういう奴なんだ。| いちいち: You shouldn't do that. Yushka has always been|like that. If you keep on bothering him,|there'll be no end to it.

321.「……それにしても 君が アストルティアに| 抜け駆けして行ってたなんて 僕も初: I never heard that you had skipped out on a|trip to Astoltia. It must have been a fun|trip.

322.「いじけるなよ アスバル。| 俺が大魔王になったら 夢は すぐそこだ。| 今度こ: Don't be coy, Asbal. When I become the Great|Demon King, my dream is right around the|corner. This time, come with us to Astoltia.

323.「お前なんかには 頼らない……。| 大魔王になるのは この僕だ！: I won't depend on you... it's me who will be|the Great Demon King!

324.「ハッ。とんだ茶番だな。| 異郷の地は 我らバルディスタが 征服する。: Ha. What a travesty. We Valdistas will conquer|this foreign land.

325.「先の侵攻で 奴らのチカラが| どの程度のものかは 理解できた。: The last invasion gave us an idea of how|powerful they are.

326.「うわさの勇者姫も 期待していたほどの | 強さではなかったな……。: The rumored Hero Princess was not as strong as|I had hoped...

327.「……そういう油断が 命取りになる。| アストルティアの 何を理解したというんだ: That kind of carelessness can be fatal. What|do you understand about Astoltia? I think|you're the one who's being naive.

328.「……大魔王になったら こういう奴らを| ひとつに まとめなきゃならないんだ。|: When I become the Great Demon King, I'll have|to unite all these people into one. It's not|easy at all.

329.<pc>は ３人の魔王たちと|たき火のそばで 休んだ……。<me 64>: <pc> rested by the Bonfire with the|three Demon Kings...<me 64>

330.「起きたか。| 俺たちも そろそろ 出発するぞ。: You're up. We'd better get going too.

331.「他の魔王様は つい先ほど| 出発してしまいましたですじゃ。: The other Demon Kings left just a few minutes|ago.

332.「ワイも 出発しますですじゃ。| また 後で お会いしましょうですじゃ～！: I'm leaving too. I'll see you later.

333.「……やはり ただの | 無謀な挑戦者では なかったな。: ...I knew he wasn't just some|foolish challenger.

334.「左様ですじゃ。ひょうきんな| 旅の商人スッテンテンとは 仮の姿……: Correct. The funny Peddler Suttenten is just a|temporary form...

335.「その正体は デモンマウンテンの門番| デモンズゲイト。: My true identity is Demon Zugei, the|gatekeeper of Demon Mountain.

336.「大審門を開いた 相克する天運を持つ者たち。| この場所に至るまで そのチカラを: You with conflicting fates who opened the|Demongate. I have been assessing your power|until you arrived at this place...

337.「そうか。もちろん 合格だろ？: Oh, yeah. Of course. You passed, right?

338.「これが デモンマウンテン 最後の試練。| 我こそは 魔仙卿に会う 資格ありと|: This is the final trial of Demon Mountain.|Prove to me that you are worthy of meeting the|Oracle!

339.「絶対に 負けるわけにはいかない。 | もし 大魔王に なれなければ| きっと母: I can't lose. If I don't become the Great|Demon King, I'm sure my mother will try to...

341.「ま ちょうどいいハンデには なるだろう。| いくぞ！: It'll be a good handicap for us. Let's go!

343.「相克する天運を持つ みなさま…… | どうぞ この先へ お進みくだされですじゃ: All you of opposing fates... please continue|onward.

344.「……ようやく 魔仙卿との対面か。 | 試されているヒマなど ないのだがな。: At last, a meeting with the Oracle. I don't|have time to be tested.

345.「魔界統一を果たし 乱世を終わらせるため| 闇の根源のチカラ……| 必ず 我が物: In order to unify the Demon World and end this|turbulent era, the power of the source of|darkness... will surely be mine.

346.「……ユシュカ。僕は 誰の指図も受けず| 自分のチカラで 自由を手に入れ| 望み: Yushka. I will obtain my freedom and fulfill|my desires by my own power, without anyone|telling me what to do.

349.「……さっきの戦いでは だいぶ 消耗したな。| だが 休んでる時間はないぞ。: ...I bet that fight just now took a lot of|you. But there's no time to rest.

350.「いよいよ 魔仙卿とのご対面だ。| 最後まで ちゃんと ついてこいよ！: It's finally time to meet the Oracle. Make|sure you stick with me to the end!

351.「我が大矛の サビになるがいい。: Become a stain upon my halberd.

352.「常識にとらわれないのは あなたの美徳ですが | まわりに与える影響も 考えてい:
It is your virtue to think outside the box,|but I ask you to consider the impact you have|on those around you. If you disturb the peace|
|of the nation, you are on the wrong end of the|stick.

353.「シシカバブ団の件……放置すれば 禍根が残る。: The Shish Kebab clan...if left unchecked, the|problem will remain.

354.「これは 彼らだけの問題では ありません。| 現状に 不満を持つ者どもが 納得で:
This is not only their problem. Isn't a ruler|supposed to give a satisfactory answer to|those who are dissatisfied with the status|
|quo?

355.「ったく……お前は いつも 正論ばかりだ。| そんなことくらい わかってるさ。|: Damn...you're always right. I know that. I'm|not going to leave it at that.

356.「……よしよし。 | これなら ナジーンも 文句は言えんだろ。| あとは あいつ: Good, good. I guess Nazine can't|complain now. I'll leave the rest to him.

357.「彼の 労をねぎらうのを| どうぞ お忘れなく。: Please don't forget to thank him for his hard|work.

358.「現状に 不満を持つ者どもが 納得できる答えを| 示してこその 統治者なのでは？: Isn't a ruler supposed to provide answers that|please those who are dissatisfied with the|status quo?

359.<pc>は 階段を上って|玉座の間へと 進んだ。: <pc> proceeded up the stairs to the|throne room.

360.「お帰りなさいませ。| 我が主 魔王ユシュカ。: Welcome back. My lord, Demon King Yushka.
